basics.name: Kamil Mellouk
basics.label: Data Science & Financial Engineering Master Student
basics.summary: Data Science & Financial Engineering Master student at EPFL with professional experience in AI-driven solutions and deep learning, alongside leadership in student-run technical consulting projects.

work.name: Atos Technology Services
work.summary: Developed RAG-enabled LLM platform with AI agent automations, leveraging cloud infrastructure. Contributed to computer vision solutions using satellite imagery for climate impact assessment on Swiss mountain territories.
highlights: Presented client-focused innovations to AWS solutions architects

work.name: Dynamilis — EPFL DeepTech Spinoff
work.summary: Contributed to the development of an iPad app for diagnosing dysgraphia in children, focused on feature engineering and machine learning model optimization.
highlights: Presented research results to EPFL board members

volunteer.summary: Managed 12 client projects, ensuring high satisfaction and successful delivery for a non-profit student-run consulting company with CHF 300k yearly turnover.

volunteer.organization: Fika — subscription-based coffee service on campus
volunteer.summary: Led a team of 13 students in launching a coffee subscription service on EPFL campus, exceeding sales targets.

volunteer.position: Head of IT & Trading Game Organizer
volunteer.summary: Managed the ranking system and cheating detection for Switzerland's largest Trading Game, while also revamping the association’s website.
highlights: Ensured fair play in the Trading Game

projects.name: RAG-enabled DPO-tuned LLM for MCQ answering
projects.summary: Developed an LLM system optimized for answering MCQs based on EPFL exam questions.

projects.name: Interactive Robust Journey Planning on CFF network
projects.summary: Developed a robust journey planning system for Swiss railways, scoring full points and used as reference for future editions.

projects.name: Dynamic Correlation Analysis of Cryptocurrency Markets
projects.summary: Conducted an analysis of cryptocurrency markets using intraday data to examine dynamic correlations.
